entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
